mapper.select: SELECT T1.MODULE_NAME FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE T1 INNER JOIN T_SYSTEM_MODULE T2 ON T1.PARENT_MODULE_ID = T2.ID WHERE T2.MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName} AND T1.FLAG = #{flag} AND T1.STATUS = 'NORMAL' ORDER BY T1.MODULE_NAME
SELECT MODULE_NAME FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE WHERE 1 =1 AND PARENT_MODULE_ID=0 GROUP BY MODULE_NAME
SELECT * FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE WHERE PARENT_MODULE_ID = '0' AND STATUS = 'NORMAL'
SELECT T.MODULE_NAME FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE T WHERE T.PARENT_MODULE_ID = '0' AND T.STATUS = 'NORMAL'
SELECT T1.* FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE T1 INNER JOIN T_SYSTEM_MODULE T2 ON T1.PARENT_MODULE_ID = T2.ID WHERE T2.MODULE_NAME = #{0} AND T1.MODULE_NAME = #{1} AND T1.FLAG = #{2} AND T1.STATUS = 'NORMAL'
SELECT MAX(ID+0) FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE WHERE PARENT_MODULE_ID = #{parentModuleId}
SELECT T.MODULE_NAME FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE T WHERE T.FLAG <> #{0} AND T.PARENT_MODULE_ID = '0' AND T.STATUS = 'NORMAL'
SELECT T1.* FROM T_SYSTEM_MODULE T1 WHERE 1 =1 AND T1.MODULE_NAME = #{parentModuleName} AND T1.PARENT_MODULE_ID = '0'
